WILCO: a predictive maintenance tool
  1. Home
  2. Projects
  3. Easyjet

Connect real-time avionic data with ground

What we did

Secured Deployment (SaaS) System drawings Live alerts Stardard ACMS report decoding Custom ACMS report decoding Prediction rules (IFTs) Uplink automation (IFTs)

About the project

EasyJet, the UK's largest airline, is working with FlightWatching to install a state-of-the-art early fault prognosis tool which can provide the airlineâ€™s operations and engineering staff with live updates directly from all of its aircraft as they fly.

About the tool

WILCO monitors the systems behavior using ACARS. The aircraft is in the conditions of the fault (engines on, flight, ...). Therefore, the root cause can be identified before landing.

With WILCO, 100% of the real-time data coming from your aircraft has now an added-value. Avoid AOG situations, outstation repairs and size your maintenance teams to optimize the dispatch.

IT!
